com.deezer.sdk.player.event

Interface OnPlayerStateChangeListener


  • public interface OnPlayerStateChangeListener
    Defines the behavior of a listener of the player's state change. It will be notified of any change in the state of the player.
    Author:
    Deezer
    See Also:
    PlayerState, Player

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPlayerStateChange(PlayerState state, long timePosition)
      Callback method that will be called when the player's state changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerStateChange

        void onPlayerStateChange(PlayerState state,
                       long timePosition)
        Callback method that will be called when the player's state changes.
        Parameters:
        state - the new state in which the player has entered.
        timePosition - the position (in ms) in the track.
